text: Joshua David Angrist (born September 18, 1960) is an Israeli-American economist. He is the Ford Professor of Economics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. In 2021, Angrist won the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economics, together with David Card and Guido Imbens. ==References== ==Other websites== * Faculty profile of Joshua Angrist on the website of MIT * Profile of Joshua Angrist on the website of the NBER * Profile of Joshua Angrist as research fellow on the website of IZA Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American economists Category:Israeli economists Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Scientists from Columbus, Ohio Category:Scientists from Massachusetts Category:People from Brookline, Massachusetts
title: Joshua Angrist
